Description: Clay tablet; complete; administrative; wool; mentions Abi-eshuh "k"; seals; Old Babylonian; repaired.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.237)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
